column2: George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act Three (2015) #5
column6: THE FINAL ISSUE OF GEORGE ROMERO'S NEW HORROR EPIC! • The moment everyone's been waiting for! All out ZOMBIE VERSUS VAMPIRE WARFARE! • A daring rescue mission to save the children at the vampire feeding farm! • Who will rule the EMPIRE OF THE DEAD?
column8: | penciller (cover):Francesco Mattina | artist:Andrea Mutti | writer:George Romero
